LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription16: Some of your colonists got infected with the plague.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription17: Some of your colonists got infected with the flu.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription18: Some colonists have gotten sick from an infection. \n\nEnsure you have medical beds and a doctor. Make sure that they get proper treatment and spend as much time in bed as possible.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription19: Some of your colonists got infected with malaria.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription20: Some of your colonists got gut worms.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription21: Some of your colonists got muscle parasites.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription22: All of your colonists got infected with the plague.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription23: All of your colonists got infected with the flu.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription25: All of your colonists got infected with malaria.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription26: All of your colonists got gut worms.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription27: All of your colonists got muscle parasites.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription28: One of your colonists, no names shall be named, thought it would be funny to make an eye poking "trick". Now, one thing lead to another and the good news is that we now have an "Eye poking" champion. Again, no names shall be named.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription29: The weather is changing to: clear weather
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription30: The weather is changing to: rain
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription31: The weather is changing to: rainy thunderstorm
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription32: The weather is changing to: dry thunderstorm
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription33: The weather is changing to: gentle snow
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription34: The weather is changing to: hard snow
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription35: The weather is changing to: fog
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription36: The weather is changing to: foggy rain
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription37: The weather is changing to: flashstorm
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription40: It's raining vomit. You might want to clean it up near you.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription43: A bunch of large meteorites have struck ground in the area.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription50: A tornado has touched down in this region, and will proceed to wreak havoc on its way.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription51: 10 tornados have touched down in this region, and will proceed to wreak havoc on their way.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription55: A colonist has had a breakthrough and will get a permanent {skill} boost
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription57: Everyone in your colony takes a hit of luciferium.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription60: Some animals have decided to live in your area.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription66: Maybe you should have been a bit nicer to the animals in your surrounding. The rabbits and deers were plotting against you for the longest time now. They have finally collected enough meat to pay the big boys...
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription74:
Everyone has gone berserk.
Everyone will attack anyone they see.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription80: {from} decided to send you a care package with {amount} {item}! Thank you {from}!
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription87: Military aid from another faction has appeared.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription88: A trade ship has gone haywire and started sending several resources to your base my mistake.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription89: {colonist} has a sudden urge for some human flesh.
LanguageData.TwitchStoriesDescription90: A large meteorite shower has entered the area, it would be wise to seek cover.
